# readUpBank

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/readUpBank)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=readUpBank)
<!-- badges: end -->

An unofficial R package to access Australian Bank Up's API.

## Installation

You can install the development version of readUpBank from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("karl-sparks/readUpBank")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(readUpBank)
## basic example code
```
